amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Community Development Fund by $20 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Community Development Fund by $20 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 288 (Roll no. 279).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
